name: AssignGithubIssue
description:
Assign users to a GitHub issue.

Use this tool to assign up to 10 users to a GitHub issue without replacing existing assignees.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. This field is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the GitHub issue to which assignees will be added.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the issue.

parameters.name: assignee_usernames
parameters.description: Usernames of people to assign to the issue. Only users with push access can be assigned.

value_schema.description: Usernames of people to assign this issue to. _NOTE: Only users with push access can add assignees to an issue. Assignees are silently ignored otherwise._

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: issue_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the issue.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the issue.

parameters.name: assignees
parameters.description: Usernames of people to assign this issue to. _NOTE: Only users with push access can add assignees to an issue. Assignees are silently ignored otherwise._

value_schema.description: Usernames of people to assign this issue to. _NOTE: Only users with push access can add assignees to an issue. Assignees are silently ignored otherwise._

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
